'''Brightwood''' is obtained by cutting down Brightwood Trees. It is an item used to craft [[furnishings]].

==Locations==
Brightwood can be found in [[Pardis Dhyai]], [[Sumeru City]] and [[Port Ormos]].

See the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=417 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.
